results.content: The lectures are good in general but a very basic course.  I found I do absorb what has been taught incrementally.   I was hoping for a more in depth and practical course.
results.content_html: The lectures are good in general but a very basic course. I found I do absorb what has been taught incrementally. I was hoping for a more in depth and practical course.

results.content:
The 2nd & 3rd sessions are not about awk. The heading says something and video talks about something else (not related to awk) like how to execute a shell script, how to use more command etc.. no course material. You can skip first few minutes of every video as they are repetitive. 
This course explains basic use of awk. However I like this as a single video for beginners. One can avoid browsing youtube

results.content: I expected a expert level AWK training. This training is for beginners. It is misguiding people. The topic name should be changed.
results.content_html: I expected a expert level AWK training. This training is for beginners. It is misguiding people. The topic name should be changed.
